About Lumen

Lumen is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work. With 450,000 route fiber miles serving customers in more than 60 countries, we deliver the fastest, most secure global platform for applications and data to help businesses, government and communities deliver amazing experiences. Learn more about Lumen’s network, edge cloud, security and communication and collaboration solutions and our purpose to further human progress through technology at news.lumen.com, LinkedIn: /lumentechnologies, Twitter: @lumentechco, Facebook: /lumentechnologies, Instagram: @lumentechnologies and YouTube: /lumentechnologies.

The Role

The candidate will collaborate with a team of data engineers and developers and will be responsible for designing and developing Software solutions using the listed skill sets. The candidate will work closely with product owners, engineering managers and other stake holders to understand the requirements and design to efficiently implement and deliver the solution. The candidate will be working in an agile environment and collaborating with onshore and offshore resources.

The Main Responsibilities

The candidate will assist in grooming the solution along with the engineering manager and team members based on the requirements
During the sprints, the candidate will develop the code as per the requirements, perform local testing and review the code with team members
The candidate will participate in all the scrum ceremonies and ensure the agile process is practiced leading to a successful outcome
The Candidate will collaborate and help other team members resolve their issues/impediments
The candidate will enhance the application by identifying opportunities for improvement, making recommendations, and designing and implementing fixes
The Candidate will follow robust DevOps practices, and use CI/CD practices deploying the application
The Candidate will lead the production deployment and conduct post deployment validation

What We Look For In a Candidate

Required Qualifications / Skills

Demonstrated knowledge of application development using Java 8 and Spring Boot framework
Experience in developing REST APIs using microservice architecture, GraphQL.
Experience in developing apps that operate using Confluent Kafka
Experience in using RDBMS like Oracle, MySQL, SQL, NOSQL – Cassandra
Experience in implementing CI/CD, preferably using GitHub/Jenkins
Experience in deploying apps to Kubernetes/Docker
Knowledge of security protocols like JWT/Oauth2
8+ years of development experience with a bachelor's degree in a related field
Experience in Kafka – Event Driven Architecture.

Desired Qualifications / Skills

Experience In developing applications using graph databases like DataStax Enterprise Graph
Knowledge of GraphQL, Cypher, and Gremlin queries
Development experience in Python
Experience with Agile/SCRUM Methodologies and development practices
Cloud design experience in Azure/GCP
Demonstrated experience in system ownership
Demonstrated Experience in architecting/leading system design for distributed systems, defending design choices and engaging in trade-off conversations
Ability to influence peers/leaders and teams

The candidate should also have

Proficient communication skills
Excellent customer service skills to ensure client satisfaction
Effective collaboration skills with stakeholders and team members
Ability to train and coach / mentor junior team members.
Able to work independently with minimal guidance
